plentry.pd: -1: Unsupported video type. Currently, only H.264 and H.265 formats are supported for querying. If the video is in another format, this value is returned.
5: Basic codec support, i.e., encoding and decoding for videos under 1080p and 30 fps.
10: Supports encoding and decoding up to 1080p and 30 fps.
20: Supports encoding and decoding up to 1080p and 60 fps.
30: Supports encoding and decoding up to 4K and 30 fps.
-1: Unsupported video type. Currently, only H.264 and H.265 formats are supported. If the video is in another format, this value is returned.
5: Basic codec support, i.e., encoding and decoding for videos below 1080p and 30 fps.
10: Supports encoding and decoding up to 1080p, 30 fps.
20: Supports encoding and decoding up to 1080p, 60 fps.
30: Supports encoding and decoding up to 4K, 30 fps.
-1: Unsupported video type. Currently only H.264 and H.265 formats are supported. If the video is in another format, this value is returned.
5: Basic codec support, i.e., encoding and decoding for video up to 1080p and 30 fps.
10: Supports encoding and decoding for video up to 1080p and 30 fps.
20: Supports encoding and decoding for video up to 1080p and 60 fps.
30: Supports encoding and decoding for video up to 4K and 30 fps.
-1: Unsupported video type. Currently, only video in H.264 and H.265 formats is supported for querying. If the video is in another format, this value is returned.
5: Basic codec support, i.e., encoding and decoding for video up to 1080p and 30 fps.
10: Supports encoding and decoding video up to 1080p and 30 fps.
20: Supports encoding and decoding video up to 1080p and 60 fps.
30: Supports encoding and decoding video up to 4K and 30 fps.
